descriptionHtml:
Frst of all english is not my native language so i use google translate.


I made this little helmet replacer thats allow all guards in skyrim wear a "medieval" look helmet
Â 
i'm not skilled in modding but i think is a lore-friendly mod so i decided to share with the community

IMPORTANT

- the meshes and textures aren't mine i don't remember the creator of those but all credits are for the respective creator.

- the helmet has a glitch when you see it in the inventory but not affect the look in-game.
author: camufla
